title: CNBC Daily Open: Capex is the number to look at amid Big Tech earnings
description: The crux is that spending on artificial intelligence isn't going to slow down, at least for the next year, thanks to increasing demand for AI services.
content:
The news is coming in fast and thick. Strap in.
First, interest rates.
The U.S. Federal Reserve lowered rates by 25 basis points, as expected by traders. But Chair Jerome Powell cautioned that another cut in December, which the market had been pricin... [1662 chars]

title: Alphabet Sales Beat Estimates On Google Cloud Unit Growth
description: Alphabet Inc. sales topped quarterly Wall Street estimates, fueled by a surge in demand for its cloud and artificial intelligence services. Shares rose as much as 7.5% in extended trading.
content:
Alphabet Inc. sales topped quarterly Wall Street estimates, fueled by a surge in demand for its cloud and artificial intelligence services. Shares rose as much as 7.5% in extended trading.
Third-quarter sales, excluding partner payouts, rose to $87.5... [5040 chars]

title: OpenAI may target $1 trillion valuation in IPO, reports Reuters
description: OpenAI, the company that, for many, has become synonymous with the AI revolution, is now moving towards the next step in its expansion. According to Reuters on Wednesday, which cited unnamed sources, the artificial intelligence startup OpenAI is getting ready to submit an IPO application as early as next year, which could result in a $1 trillion market valuation for the business.
content:
OpenAI may target $1 trillion valuation in IPO: reports
OpenAI announced earlier this week that it has finished reorganising into a more conventional corporate structure, which would enable a public offering. In a recent employee share sale, the comp... [1329 chars]

title: OpenAI Eyes Record-Breaking $1 Trillion IPO To Fund AGI Infrastructure: Reuters
description: OpenAI, the world's leading artificial intelligence company, is laying the initial groundwork for an Initial Public Offering or an IPO that could value the ChatGPT maker at up to $1 trillion. This will be making it one of the largest public debuts of all time, according to a report from Reuters.
content: OpenAI, the world's leading artificial intelligence company, is laying the initial groundwork for an Initial Public Offering or an IPO that could value the ChatGPT maker at up to $1 trillion. This will be making it one of the largest public debuts of... [1952 chars]

title: Samsung Electronics Q3 profit jumps 32% on conventional chip boom
description: SEOUL (Reuters) -Samsung Electronics reported on Thursday a 32% rise in third-quarter operating profit, as the booming conventional chip market helped offset a gradual recovery in its artificial intelligence chip sales.
content:
SEOUL (Reuters) -Samsung Electronics reported on Thursday a 32% rise in third-quarter operating profit, as the booming conventional chip market helped offset a gradual recovery in its artificial intelligence chip sales.

title: Mixed share reaction to megacap earnings burst, Meta droops
description: (Reuters) -Shares in three of the "Magnificent Seven" companies with significant investments in artificial intelligence were mixed in after-hours trade on Wednesday after the mega caps released third quarter earnings.
content:

title: ‘Video of man patting tiger is fake, AI generated’
description: the management of pench tiger reserve (ptr), maharashtra, on wednesday, issued a press release, stating that the video or photo of a person patting a tiger on a village street inside the tiger reserve on social media is entirely fake and has been generated using artificial intelligence (ai). no such incident has occurred within or around the tiger reserve, it stated.
content:
Staff Reporter :
